paragraphs.body: Heh, fast response. While you were typing this, I was going to post:

paragraphs.body: I've closed the page for new, we have plenty of admins. Tell me if you disagree. I'll let the two people I've already talked to reapply, though.

paragraphs.body: Please dont revert this page. I and others have worked hard on it and it is clearly stated two times on this page and one time on the front page that aplications are closed. Thanks! 72.88.240.56 18:22, 13 August 2008 (UTC)ChaosMaster16

paragraphs.body: I really would like to. As the Bureaucrat of this wiki, I control the standards for adminship, and I'd like what I want reflected on the page. Having a bold message on the top isn't necessary, and doesn't look professional. None of your work is going to waste, it will all be replaced when applications are re-opened. I will wait for your reply before reverting. Howabout1-(Talk) 05:54, 15 August 2008 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I really would like to. As the Bureaucrat of this wiki, I control the standards for adminship, and I'd like what I want reflected on the page. paragraphs.body: I will wait for a reply before changing the page. I am the one and only judge for admins, so I would like to have the page reflect what I judge on. You have posted a list of things admins would watch for, which are fine, but they have nothing to do with the application process. I respect that you are trying to help and what you have done, but I am going to change it unless you can explain why I shouldn't. Howabout1-(Talk) 23:49, 21 August 2008 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Something I've been wondering about for a while but for some reason just never asked till now: Shouldn't this page (and the "request for bureaucrat" and "request for fanon adminship") be renamed "nominations for (fanon) adminship/bureaucrat" as according to current policy those positions can only be acquired after a successful nomination, no longer a request. That might also take away confusion some users might have on how to become an admin here (just remarking this after Vulmen undid some user's edit earlier who asked to be accepted as an admin and someone who asked Dc about adminship). Lady Lostris vstf (talk • HotN) 01:32, December 13, 2011 (UTC)
